topic.fullpath: Topic :: Text Editors :: Integrated Development Environments (IDE)

name: JResEditor - Editor for Java resources
short_description: JResEditor eases the editing of java resource files. It provides validation and allows easy comparison of multiple resource files. The GUI allows easy navigation to any key and provides wizards to create keys and new resource files.
